name: Looney Tunes Game
description:
The game application allows you to test the ability to solve various puzzles and quests. Gameplay in the mythical world of Looney Tunes with the main character in the image of the rabbit Bugs Bunny. Each of the 12 levels contains a unique and non-standard puzzle that you need to solve to get the key or pass the level.

Control:
Arrows on the keyboard or WASD
Spacebar - Jump
Mouse for individual manipulations

Note:
The game is temporarily available only in Russian
